entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Toronto Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:07 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto City Centre Airport 10:55 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 2.6°C
Pressure: 99.7 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 2.0°C
Wind: ENE 24 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Rain along the lakeshore. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
